column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque has a well deserved reputation of being one of the best BBQ in the Chicago area. In my family
column2: we ordered the shredded pork sandwich
column4: and st. louis ribs.  All were excellent.  The shredded pork is meaty
column5: the brisket is tender we cut ours with a fork
column6: and the ribs fall off the bone.  It's clear the restaurant slow cooks the meat for hours.
